title: The Millennium time bomb
brief_description: This video looks at the issues surrounding the problems which will be faced by computers when the dates changes from 1999 to 2000. Date reliant systems, which is most of the computers used in business situations, from hospitals to stockmarkets, across the world will behave unpredictably. Issues discussed include worse case scenarios and what is being done in 1998/1999 to overcome the problem.
